description: The minions of your divine patrons stand ready to answer your call.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Aura class feature, ability to cast summon monster.

sections.text: When using summon monster to summon creatures whose alignment subtype or subtypes exactly match your aura, you may cast the spell as a standard action instead of with a casting time of 1 round.
sections.name: Benefits

name: Sacred Summons
